#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        string num;
        cin>>num;

        int inc = 0;
        int dec = 0;

        for(int i=1; i<num.length(); i++)
        {
            if(num[i] > num[i-1])
                dec = 1;
            else if(num[i] < num[i-1])
                inc = 1;
        }

        if(inc==1 && dec==1)
            cout<<1<<endl;
        else
            cout<<0<<endl;
    }
}
